PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-05702010-05-13,  ,  ,  ,  JUS
ActCriminal Code
SubjectOrder Amending the Order Declaring an Amnesty Period (2006)
PrecisOrder Amending the ORDER DECLARING AN AMNESTY PERIOD (2006), which extends the amnesty period protecting individuals from incurring criminal liability under the Criminal Code as a result of the illegal possession of unregistered non-restricted firearms, for one year (from May 16, 2010 to May 16, 2011).
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0104 Publication Date: 2010-05-26
AttachmentsAttachment
